name: Go for Block: Relaxing Puzzle Game
name_original: Go for Block: Relaxing Puzzle Game
description:
Go for Block is a  free puzzle games focussing on logic to find the best possible way to get to the goal

Be prepared for the best block puzzles game of 2020

Play the relaxing Block game with different colorful blocks and multipel levels of difficulty
A fun and stress reducing  addicting game for all ages.

How to Play ?

Slide the block on the board. but be prepared to confront multiple obstacle to block your way and hinder you to get to the goal

-How far did you get ?

Features:
- Offline Playable
- Hours of fun, exciting play.
- It has all features of a great puzzle block game.
- Innovativ Puzzle Game.
- Multiple Levels with more to come.
- No time limits and no wifi need.
- Designed to be playable with one hand.
- Totally Free to Play.

Play this Minimalistic block game to relax and train your brain. You can play this Go for Block : Relaxing Puzzle Game anytime and anywhere!

What are you waiting for Download Go for Block Now
